alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 12:58PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JUAB AND SOUTHWESTERN UTAH COUNTIES... At 1255 PM MST...an area of heavy snow was over Woodland Hills, or near Payson...moving east at 20 mph. Visibility has droped to 1/4 mile at the Spanish Fork Airport. Locations impacted include... Payson, Spanish Fork, Springville, Santaquin, Mapleton, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Benjamin, Palmyra, Lake Shore, Spring Lake, West Mountain, Elberta, Utah Lake, Genola, Goshen and Birdseye. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 239 and 261. US Route 6 between mile markers 150 and 199. US Route 89 between mile markers 303 and 312. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
